TopicTitle: KSP nominated for Best Sci-Fi Game - Voting now open

Articles.Content:
Keep voting guys. KSP is head to head with The Swapper whatever that is. Eve online is just behind.

I think it says something that KSP is higher on the list than Eve Online, a quite reputable online game.
Voted! Eve and KSP seem to be tied.
Eve edging ahead.
Voted. I so want to support KSP.

Voted

Hope to see Kerbals invasion everywhere soon!
Voted. KSP has 36% of the votes with Eve just behind with 31%
KSP is slightly ahead of Eve. Go Kerbals!
Voted for KSP and EVE.

KSP is gaining a good lead.

I voted for the WiiU as best console:P
I'm voting for KSP!

KSP is gaining a good lead.

I voted for the WiiU as best console:P

Good catch, gonna vote WiiU too.

edit: Wow, PS4 is dominating (rightly so though, compared to what MS tried to pull on us)

Edited November 8, 2013 by OrtwinS
Voted KSP is going head to head with Eve Online. WooT!
voted. KSP still ahead @ 36%
Still a narrow margin at 36% after voting.

Of course they get my vote.

Still leading with 36%... go kerbals!

Voted for KSP

I don't even play on console, but PS4 looks like the best one, voted
It's got science in it and its fictitious, its Sci-Fi!
I voted KSP. Now Voting is on hold...what does it mean?
I went to vote, and got "Voting is on hold" for that category.

I went to vote, and got "Voting is on hold" for that category.

Same for me. What's the problem?

Same for me. What's the problem?

Maybe they're tallying!
Well, KSP is currently in the lead just ahead of eve so if the vote is being tallied right now, we would win.

Voted (from work and home). Do any graphs exist for days other than "Yesterday's Performance"? Because what it currently shows for yesterday is that we had a monstrous 88% of the Sci-fi votes. By how much are we actually winning?

Tomb Raider is one of the 4 nominated for the "best story" catagory. I'm not sure I could comment politely on that.

I do love the contrast in styles of the thumbnails used to represent the 4 sci-fi games. The 3 non-KSP ones could all be interchanged and you wouldn't be able to tell; moodily lit with reflective metallic surfaces and too much bloom for the human eye to handle. KSP on the other hand features 3 gimpy looking aliens in dayglo orange jumpsuits. Hooray for KSP!

Maybe they're tallying!

Voting is back up.
